div.style: z-index: 6; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; font-weight: 400; color: #ffffff; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Open Sans;
div.p:
“I no longer feel
alone in the fight
for my child."

“[My daughter’s teacher] has not only changed
her educational experience, but she has
helped her change the way she feels about
herself, resulting in a life change for both of us.”

div.style: z-index: 6; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; font-weight: 400; color: #ffffff; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Open Sans;
div.p:
“I have truly seen a
positive change in
my daughter."

"I have truly seen a positive change in my daughter. I know
it has to do with everyone at the school from her teachers
to her peers. They all have amazing attitudes and are
leaving a positive mark on my daughter. I LOVE how
involved the parents are and how all the staff are always
there to help. Never, since my daughter started, have I
had any problems. I love [Imagine]."

div.style: z-index: 6; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; font-weight: 400; color: #ffffff; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Open Sans;
div.p:
“This school has inspired
me to be [more than] just
average and the teachers
treat me like I'm
important..."

"[The teachers] are super fun and fair to everyone, no
no matter who it is. I love this school."

div.style: z-index: 6; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; font-weight: 400; color: #ffffff; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Open Sans;
div.p:
"...I felt she would have
more one on one teaching."

"I chose Imagine School because my child was coming
from a large school...and I wanted her to go to a smaller
school where I felt she would have more one on one
teaching and when looking through your curriculum on
the website, I felt it would be a better option than
Canton City Schools."

div.style: z-index: 6; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; font-weight: 400; color: #ffffff; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Open Sans;
div.p:
“I truly believe my
child is receiving a
high level of education."

“Thank you to all the staff at Imagine School
for all your hard work and making a difference.
Please continue motivating our children
because they are our tomorrow. ”

div.style: z-index: 6; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; font-weight: 400; color: #ffffff; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Open Sans;
div.p: “When you notice the visible differences between your own child and comparing that to other children in different schools,

whether at the same age level or not – and seeing
how much your child is learning, it is a world
of difference. Proud mom and parent of an [Imagine]
student! The standards and education combined
with the staff and teacher at Imagine are by far amazing.”

div.style: z-index: 6; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; font-weight: 400; color: #ffffff; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Open Sans;
div.p:
“Imagine strives to
educate every child at
their individual level

with students' strengths and weaknesses
in mind. I am so appreciative of [the teachers]
for their work in pushing my kids to to be
their very best in Academics, Character, and
Leadership.”

p.em: Parent of Two Imagine Students, Arizona

div.style: z-index: 6; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; font-weight: 400; color: #ffffff; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Open Sans;
div.p:
“Imagine has been
a miracle.”

“Coming from a school with endless bullying,
Imagine has been a miracle. It has allowed
me to create confidence in myself through
character education. It encourages me to
change the world starting with the small
ideas such as being faithful to a friend or
responsible with schoolwork.”

div.style: z-index: 6; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; font-weight: 400; color: #ffffff; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Open Sans;
div.p:
“Imagine Schools has
made a better high
school experience for me

that will not only lead to better job skills but also
better life skills. Imagine looks at the present and
also the future for your life. To them you are not
just a number, but a future success in the world.”

div.p: The safety and well-being of every student and staff member is Imagine Schools’ highest priority. We are monitoring the situation regarding COVID-19 (Coronavirus) very closely, and are in regular communication with local and state health departments to be sure we have access to the latest information and recommendations from federal, state, regional, and local authorities.

The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has an extensive collection of information, recommendations, status updates and Frequently Asked Questions about the COVID-19 virus. Imagine Schools recommends referring to those sources for general information about the virus, preventive measures, travel recommendations and alerts, and other valuable information about this rapidly evolving situation.

We will continue to monitor this evolving situation closely, and will update families as necessary. In the meantime, it is important not to panic. Please be assured that the health and safety of our students and staff is our highest priority, and we will continue to do all that we can to maintain continuity of operations while minimizing student and staff exposure.
